captions.text: - Oh, no.

I'm just going to spit on the
table, cause I don't care.

I don't care; my mouth
hurts too much to stop.
(bouncy music)
- [Voiceover] Bacon flavored vodka.
- It smells like bacon dog treats.
- Yeah.
- Whoa.
- Owwww.

- I hate vodka so much.
- Why?

- Because it's terrible.
- I love vodka.
- You love Russian accents.

- I'm salivating like
crazy, like look at that.

Look at this. Look.
- No.

- My mouth is just fighting
it. It's like no, no.

- [Voiceover] Yogurt liquor.
- [Voiceover] Yogurt!
- Like a bowling pin that has milk in it.
- Since 1575?
This is older than America.
- Who ever thought that like yogurt
and liquor sounds appealing, though?
- Oh my God.
It tastes like cheese that went bad.
- I like it.

- That's yummy.
- That is very good.
- But it's like kind of what I imagine
the consistency of semen would be.
- I've never seen Gabby this upset.

- I'm horrified.
- Except when
someone says women can't do something.
- [Voiceover] Scorpion Mezcal
- (screams)

- Whoa.
- There is a scorpion in it.
- You get distracted by the fun hat,
and you don't even notice there's
a dead bug in it.
- Excellent.

- If I had to be killed and
put into some sort of bottle,
I would not be opposed to tequila.
- I'd want to be put in ice cream.
- I feel like he's actually alive,

and he's going to be
like "Gotcha Bitches!"
- [Voiceover] Chilli Vodka
- [Voiceover] Naga Chilli Vodka

- Like the Ark of the
Covenant in liquid form,
it will melt your face off.
- Any time there's skulls on something,
it means poison or danger or don't.
(yelling)
(yelling)

- That's exactly what-
- It's on fire.
- Oh my God!
- Oh, my God. Oh, my God. Oh, my God.
- Yeah, this is the worst idea.
- Oh, my stomach hates it.
- Allison's sweating and crying
and her face is red.
- This would probably, like, melt a key,

like if you dip a key
in this (bleep), right?
Just like-

- There's a Shakespeare play,
where there's a character
who gets his tongue cut off.
I envy that character.

- That's the beauty of the
international community.
- Lotta ways to get real weird.
(bouncy music)

- (burps) Oh, even my
burp tastes like fire.

comments.text:
Mescal isn't Tequila, though all tequila's are technically mescals. You can 
only produce in the state of Jalisco and use the Blue Agave plant in the 
production process for the result to be called Tequila, whereas Mescal 
isn't limited to the one plant or location.﻿
